newsitem.title: USA: World Color Press Q1 shr $0.20 vs $0.17.
newsitem.headline: World Color Press Q1 shr $0.20 vs $0.17.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
Note: The company reported operating income for the quarter of $31.72 million versus $19.98 million for the same period a year ago.
The company said sales increases were due to the acquisitions completed in mid-1996 and the January 1997 acquisition of Rand McNally's Book Service Group, partly offset by lower paper prices.
The company said its first quarter results include $9.7 million of incremental interest expense resulting from the additional indebtness for new acquisitions.
